item.description:
Showa's annual festival is our biggest event of the year and is the result of our students' creativity and hard work. If you're interested in learning more about Japanese culture, drop by!

Admission: Free

Transportation: A free shuttle bus will depart Reservoir station (Green Line - D) every hour on the half hour starting at 12:30 pm

Some topics include:
~ US/Japan cultural differences
~ Japanese tea ceremony
~ A kids Hello Kitty room
~ Tanabata
~ Ikebana displays
~ Performances
~ And more...
item.name: Showa Boston 23rd Annual Japan Culture Festival
